trans-unit.source: Lets you efficiently bulk load a SQL Server table with data from another source.
trans-unit.target: Lar deg effektivt masseinnlasting en SQL Server-tabell med data fra andre kilder.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft SQL Server includes a popular command-prompt utility named **bcp** for moving data from one table to another, whether on a single server or between servers.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft SQL Server inneholder et populære ledeteksten verktøy navnet **bcp** for flytting av data fra en tabell til en annen, om på en enkeltserver eller mellom servere.

trans-unit.source: The SqlBulkCopy class lets you write managed code solutions that provide similar functionality.
trans-unit.target: Klassen SqlBulkCopy kan du skrive løsninger for forvaltet kode som gir lignende bruksområder.

trans-unit.source: There are other ways to load data into a SQL Server table (INSERT statements, for example), but SqlBulkCopy offers a significant performance advantage over them.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes andre måter å laste inn data i en tabell med SQL Server (for eksempel INSERT-setninger), men SqlBulkCopy tilbyr en betydelige fordel over dem.

trans-unit.source: The SqlBulkCopy class can be used to write data only to SQL Server tables.
trans-unit.target: Klassen SqlBulkCopy kan brukes til å skrive data bare for SQL Server-tabeller.

trans-unit.source: However, the data source is not limited to SQL Server; any data source can be used, as long as the data can be loaded to a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> instance or read with a <xref:System.Data.IDataReader> instance.
trans-unit.target: Datakilden er imidlertid ikke begrenset til SQL Server. alle datakilder kan brukes, så lenge data kan lastes til en <xref:System.Data.DataTable>serverforekomsten eller lese med en <xref:System.Data.IDataReader>forekomsten.</xref:System.Data.IDataReader> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: SqlBulkCopy will fail when bulk loading a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> column of type <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDateTime> into a SQL Server column whose type is one of the date/time types added in SQL Server 2008.
trans-unit.target: SqlBulkCopy mislykkes når bulk innlasting av en <xref:System.Data.DataTable>kolonnetypen <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDateTime>til en SQL Server kolonne av typen én av dato/klokkeslett-typene lagt til i SQL Server 2008.</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDateTime> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"></xref> class using the specified open instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av den angitte Åpne forekomsten av <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Because the connection is already open when the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy> instance is initialized, the connection remains open after the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy> instance is closed.
trans-unit.target: Fordi tilkoblingen er åpen når den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>forekomsten er initialisert, tilkoblingen er åpen etter den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>forekomsten er lukket.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>

trans-unit.source: If the `connection` argument is null, an <xref:System.ArgumentNullException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `connection` -argumentet er null, en <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>forårsakes.</xref:System.ArgumentNullException>

trans-unit.source: The already open <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"></xref> instance that will be used to perform the bulk copy operation.
trans-unit.target: Allerede åpen <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"> </xref> -forekomst som skal brukes til å utføre massekopieringsoperasjon.

trans-unit.source: If your connection string does not use <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integrated Security = true" name="Integrated Security = true" href=""></xref>, you can use <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential"></xref> to pass the user ID and password more securely than by specifying the user ID and password as text in the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Hvis tilkoblingsstrengen ikke bruker <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integrated Security = true" name="Integrated Security = true" href=""> </xref>, kan du bruke <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential"> </xref> skal sendes at Brukernavnet og passordet sikrere enn ved å angi at Brukernavnet og passordet som tekst i tilkoblingsstrengen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes and opens a new instance of based on the supplied connectionString.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer og åpner en ny forekomst av basert på den angitte connectionString .

trans-unit.source: The constructor uses the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"></xref> to initialize a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren bruker den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"> </xref> å initialisere en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The connection is automatically closed at the end of the bulk copy operation.
trans-unit.target: Tilkoblingen lukkes automatisk på slutten av massekopieringsoperasjon.

trans-unit.source: If `connectionString` is null, an <xref:System.ArgumentNullException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `connectionString` er null, en <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>forårsakes.</xref:System.ArgumentNullException>

trans-unit.source: If `connectionString` is an empty string, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `connectionString` er en tom streng en <xref:System.ArgumentException>forårsakes.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The string defining the connection that will be opened for use by the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Strengen som definerer tilkoblingen åpnes for bruk av den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: If your connection string does not use <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integrated Security = true" name="Integrated Security = true" href=""></xref>, you can use <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.%23ctor%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.%23ctor%2A> and <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential"></xref> to pass the user ID and password more securely than by specifying the user ID and password as text in the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Hvis tilkoblingsstrengen ikke bruker <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integrated Security = true" name="Integrated Security = true" href=""> </xref>, kan du bruke <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.%23ctor%2A> eller <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.%23ctor%2A> og <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential"> </xref> skal sendes at Brukernavnet og passordet sikrere enn ved å angi at Brukernavnet og passordet som tekst i tilkoblingsstrengen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes and opens a new instance of based on the supplied connectionString.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer og åpner en ny forekomst av basert på den angitte connectionString .

trans-unit.source: The constructor uses that <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"></xref> to initialize a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren bruker som <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"> </xref> å initialisere en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The instance behaves according to options supplied in the copyOptions parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den forekomsten fungerer i henhold til alternativene som er angitt i den copyOptions parameteren.

trans-unit.source: You can obtain detailed information about all the bulk copy options in the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyOptions> topic.
trans-unit.target: Du finner detaljert informasjon om alle bulk kopieringsalternativene i den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyOptions>emnet.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyOptions>

trans-unit.source: The string defining the connection that will be opened for use by the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Strengen som definerer tilkoblingen åpnes for bruk av den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: If your connection string does not use <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integrated Security = true" name="Integrated Security = true" href=""></xref>, you can use <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.%23ctor%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.%23ctor%2A> and <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential"></xref> to pass the user ID and password more securely than by specifying the user ID and password as text in the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Hvis tilkoblingsstrengen ikke bruker <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integrated Security = true" name="Integrated Security = true" href=""> </xref>, kan du bruke <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.%23ctor%2A> eller <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.%23ctor%2A> og <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential"> </xref> skal sendes at Brukernavnet og passordet sikrere enn ved å angi at Brukernavnet og passordet som tekst i tilkoblingsstrengen.

trans-unit.source: A combination of values from the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyOptions"></xref> enumeration that determines which data source rows are copied to the destination table.
trans-unit.target: En kombinasjon av verdier fra det <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyOptions"> </xref> opplistingen som avgjør hvilke data kilderadene kopieres til måltabellen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"></xref> class using the supplied existing open instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av den angitte eksisterende Åpne forekomsten av <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The instance behaves according to options supplied in the copyOptions parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den forekomsten fungerer i henhold til alternativene som er angitt i den copyOptions parameteren.

trans-unit.source: If a non-null <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction"></xref> is supplied, the copy operations will be performed within that transaction.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en ikke-null <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction"> </xref> er angitt, operasjonene av vil bli utført i transaksjonen.

trans-unit.source: If options include `UseInternalTransaction` and the `externalTransaction` argument is not null, an **InvalidArgumentException** is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis alternativene omfatter `UseInternalTransaction` og `externalTransaction` -argumentet er null, en **InvalidArgumentException** er et.

trans-unit.source: For examples demonstrating how to use `SqlBulkCopy` in a transaction, see [Transaction and Bulk Copy Operations](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Eksempler demonstrerer hvordan du bruker `SqlBulkCopy` i en transaksjon, kan du se [transaksjon og massekopieringsoperasjoner](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The already open <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"></xref> instance that will be used to perform the bulk copy.
trans-unit.target: Allerede åpen <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection"> </xref> -forekomst som skal brukes til å utføre massekopiering.

trans-unit.source: If your connection string does not use <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integrated Security = true" name="Integrated Security = true" href=""></xref>, you can use <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential"></xref> to pass the user ID and password more securely than by specifying the user ID and password as text in the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Hvis tilkoblingsstrengen ikke bruker <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integrated Security = true" name="Integrated Security = true" href=""> </xref>, kan du bruke <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential"> </xref> skal sendes at Brukernavnet og passordet sikrere enn ved å angi at Brukernavnet og passordet som tekst i tilkoblingsstrengen.

trans-unit.source: A combination of values from the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyOptions"></xref> enumeration that determines which data source rows are copied to the destination table.
trans-unit.target: En kombinasjon av verdier fra det <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyOptions"> </xref> opplistingen som avgjør hvilke data kilderadene kopieres til måltabellen.

trans-unit.source: An existing <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction"></xref> instance under which the bulk copy will occur.
trans-unit.target: En eksisterende <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction"> </xref> serverforekomsten under massekopiering gjennomføres.

trans-unit.source: Number of rows in each batch.
trans-unit.target: Antall rader i hvert sett.

trans-unit.source: At the end of each batch, the rows in the batch are sent to the server.
trans-unit.target: På slutten av hver bunke er radene i den satsvise jobben sendt til serveren.

trans-unit.source: A batch is complete when BatchSize rows have been processed or there are no more rows to send to the destination data source.
trans-unit.target: En bunke er fullført når BatchSize rader er behandlet eller det finnes ingen flere rader som skal sendes til datakilden for målet.

trans-unit.source: Zero (the default) indicates that each <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A> operation is a single batch.
trans-unit.target: Null (standard) angir som hver <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A>operasjonen er en enkelt bunke.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy> instance has been declared without the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyOptions> option in effect, rows are sent to the server BatchSize rows at a time, but no transaction-related action is taken.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>forekomsten er deklarert uten det <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyOptions>alternativet i kraft rader er sendt til serveren BatchSize rader om gangen, men ingen transaksjonsrelatert handling ble utført.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyOptions> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyOptions> is in effect, each batch of rows is inserted as a separate transaction.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyOptions>er i bruk, settes inn hvert sett med rader som en separat transaksjon.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyOptions>

trans-unit.source: The BatchSize property can be set at any time.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen BatchSize kan angis når som helst.

trans-unit.source: If a bulk copy is already in progress, the current batch is sized according to the previous batch size.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en massekopiering pågår allerede, er gjeldende bunke angitt i henhold til forrige bunkestørrelsen.

trans-unit.source: Subsequent batches use the new size.
trans-unit.target: Etterfølgende bunker bruke den nye størrelsen.

trans-unit.source: If the BatchSize is initially zero and changed while a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A> operation is already in progress, that operation loads the data as a single batch.
trans-unit.target: Hvis BatchSize opprinnelig er null og endret under en <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A>pågår allerede, at operasjonen laster inn data som en enkelt bunke.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any subsequent <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A> operations on the same <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy> instance use the new BatchSize.
trans-unit.target: Alle etterfølgende <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A>operasjoner i samme <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>forekomsten bruke den nye BatchSize.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The integer value of the BatchSize property, or zero if no value has been set.
trans-unit.target: Heltallsverdien egenskapen BatchSize eller null hvis ingen verdi er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Number of seconds for the operation to complete before it times out.
trans-unit.target: Antall sekunder for operasjonen skal fullføres før det blir tidsavbrutt.

trans-unit.source: If the operation does time out, the transaction is not committed and all copied rows are removed from the destination table.
trans-unit.target: Hvis operasjonen er tidsavbrutt, er ikke transaksjonen skrevet, og alle kopierte radene er fjernet i måltabellen.

trans-unit.source: The integer value of the BulkCopyTimeout property.
trans-unit.target: Heltallsverdien for egenskapen BulkCopyTimeout.

trans-unit.source: The default is 30 seconds.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 30 sekunder.

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 indicates no limit; the bulk copy will wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: Verdien 0 indikerer ingen grense; massekopiering vente på ubestemt tid.

trans-unit.source: Closes the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Lukker det <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: After you call a Close on the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy> object, no other operation will succeed.
trans-unit.target: Når du kaller en avslutning på den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>objektet, ingen andre lykkes innlimingsoperasjonen.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>

trans-unit.source: Calls to the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A> method will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Kall til <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A>metoden vil throw <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling the Close method from the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.SqlRowsCopied> event causes an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Lukk metoden fra den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.SqlRowsCopied>hendelse fører til at en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>til å bli utløst.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.SqlRowsCopied>

trans-unit.source: Note that open <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy> instances are closed implicitly at the end of a `using` block.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at åpne <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>forekomster er implisitt lukket på slutten av en `using` block.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"></xref> items.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en samling av <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopyColumnMapping"> </xref> elementer.

trans-unit.source: Column mappings define the relationships between columns in the data source and columns in the destination.
trans-unit.target: Kolonnetilordningene Definer relasjoner mellom kolonner i datakilden, og kolonner i målet.

trans-unit.source: If the data source and the destination table have the same number of columns, and the ordinal position of each source column within the data source matches the ordinal position of the corresponding destination column, the ColumnMappings collection is unnecessary.
trans-unit.target: Hvis datakilden og måltabellen har samme antall kolonner og ordenstall posisjonen for hver kildekolonne i datakilden samsvarer med ordenstall posisjonen for den tilsvarende målkolonnen ColumnMappings-samlingen er ikke nødvendig.

trans-unit.source: However, if the column counts differ, or the ordinal positions are not consistent, you must use ColumnMappings to make sure that data is copied into the correct columns.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kolonnen antall er forskjellige, eller ordenstall posisjonen er ikke konsekvent, må du bruke ColumnMappings for å kontrollere at dataene er kopiert til de riktige kolonnene.

trans-unit.source: During the execution of a bulk copy operation, this collection can be accessed, but it cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: Denne samlingen kan åpnes under kjøring av en massekopieringsoperasjon, men kan ikke endres.

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to change it will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å endre den vil throw <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: A collection of column mappings.
trans-unit.target: En samling av kolonnetilordningene.

trans-unit.source: By default, it is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: Som standard er det en tom samling.

trans-unit.source: Name of the destination table on the server.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på måltabellen på serveren.

trans-unit.source: If DestinationTableName has not been set when <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A> is called, an <xref:System.ArgumentNullException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis DestinationTableName ikke er angitt når <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A>kalles, en <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>forårsakes.</xref:System.ArgumentNullException> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A>

trans-unit.source: If DestinationTableName is modified while a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A> operation is running, the change does not affect the current operation.
trans-unit.target: Hvis DestinationTableName endres under en <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A>operasjonen kjører, at endringen påvirker ikke gjeldende operasjon.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new DestinationTableName value is used the next time a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Den nye DestinationTableName-verdien brukes neste gang en <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A>-metoden.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer%2A>

trans-unit.source: DestinationTableName is a three-part name (`<database>.<owningschema>.<name>`).
trans-unit.target: DestinationTableName er et navn på tre deler (`<database>.<owningschema>.<name>`).

trans-unit.source: You can qualify the table name with its database and owning schema if you choose.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du velger, kan du kvalifisere tabellnavnet med databasen og eier skjemaet.

trans-unit.source: However, if the table name uses an underscore ("_") or any other special characters, you must escape the name using surrounding brackets as in (`[<database>.<owningschema>.<name_01>]`).
trans-unit.target: Hvis tabellnavnet bruker et understrekingstegn (_") eller andre spesialtegn, må du imidlertid escape navnet bruker omkringliggende hakeparenteser som i (`[<database>.<owningschema>.<name_01>]`).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see "Identifiers" in SQL Server Books Online.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se "Identifikatorer" i SQL Server Books Online.

trans-unit.source: You can bulk-copy data to a temporary table by using a value such as `tempdb..#table` or `tempdb.<owner>.#table` for the DestinationTableName property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan massekopiering data til en midlertidig tabell ved hjelp av en verdi, for eksempel `tempdb..#table` eller `tempdb.<owner>.#table` for egenskapen DestinationTableName.

trans-unit.source: The string value of the DestinationTableName property, or null if none as been supplied.
trans-unit.target: Strengverdien for egenskapen DestinationTableName, eller null hvis ingen som er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables a <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"></xref> object to stream data from an <xref href="System.Data.IDataReader"></xref> object
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer eller deaktiverer en <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"> </xref> -objekt til dataflyten data fra en <xref href="System.Data.IDataReader"> </xref> objekt

trans-unit.source: When EnableStreaming is `true`, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy> reads from an <xref:System.Data.IDataReader> object using <xref:System.Data.CommandBehavior>, optimizing memory usage by using the <xref:System.Data.IDataReader> streaming capabilities.
trans-unit.target: Når EnableStreaming er `true`, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>leser fra en <xref:System.Data.IDataReader>objekt med <xref:System.Data.CommandBehavior>, optimalisere minnebruk ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Data.IDataReader>direkteavspilling funksjoner.</xref:System.Data.IDataReader> </xref:System.Data.CommandBehavior> </xref:System.Data.IDataReader> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>

trans-unit.source: When it’s set to false, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy> class loads all the data returned by the <xref:System.Data.IDataReader> object into memory before sending it to [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] or SQL Azure.
trans-unit.target: Når den er satt til USANN, den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>klassen laster inn alle data som returneres av den <xref:System.Data.IDataReader>objektet i minnet før du sender den til [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] eller SQL Azure.</xref:System.Data.IDataReader> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"></xref> object can stream data from an <xref href="System.Data.IDataReader"></xref> object; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"> </xref> objekt kan spille av data fra en <xref href="System.Data.IDataReader"> </xref> objekt; hvis ikke, false.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Defines the number of rows to be processed before generating a notification event.
trans-unit.target: Definerer antall rader som skal behandles før generering av en varslingshendelse.

trans-unit.source: This property is designed for user interface components that illustrate the progress of a bulk copy operation.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er utformet for komponenter i brukergrensesnittet som illustrerer fremdriften for en massekopieringsoperasjon.

trans-unit.source: It indicates the number of rows to be processed before generating a notification event.
trans-unit.target: Angir hvor mange rader som skal behandles før generering av en varslingshendelse.

trans-unit.source: The NotifyAfter property can be set at any time, even while a bulk copy operation is underway.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen NotifyAfter kan angis når som helst mens en massekopieringsoperasjon pågår.

trans-unit.source: Changes made during a bulk copy operation take effect after the next notification.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i løpet av en massekopieringsoperasjon tre i kraft etter neste varsling.

trans-unit.source: The new setting applies to all subsequent operations on the same instance.
trans-unit.target: Den nye innstillingen gjelder for alle etterfølgende operasjoner i samme forekomst.

trans-unit.source: If NotifyAfter is set to a number less than zero, an <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis NotifyAfter er satt til et tall mindre enn null, en <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>forårsakes.</xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>

trans-unit.source: The integer value of the NotifyAfter property, or zero if the property has not been set.
trans-unit.target: Heltallsverdien egenskapen NotifyAfter eller null hvis egenskapen er ikke angitt.

trans-unit.source: Occurs every time that the number of rows specified by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.NotifyAfter*> property have been processed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer i hver gang antall rader som er angitt av den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.NotifyAfter*>egenskapen har blitt behandlet.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.NotifyAfter*>

trans-unit.source: Note that the settings of <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.NotifyAfter%2A> and <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.BatchSize%2A> are independent.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at innstillingene for <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.NotifyAfter%2A>og <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.BatchSize%2A>uavhengige.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.BatchSize%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.NotifyAfter%2A>

trans-unit.source: Receipt of a SqlRowsCopied event does not imply that any rows have been sent to the server or committed.
trans-unit.target: Mottak av en SqlRowsCopied hendelse innebærer ikke at noen rader er sendt til serveren eller utført.

trans-unit.source: You cannot call SqlBulkCopy.Close (<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.Close%2A>) or SqlConnection.Close (<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Close%2A>) from this event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke kalle SqlBulkCopy.Close (<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.Close%2A>) eller SqlConnection.Close (<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Close%2A>) fra denne hendelsen.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Close%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: Doing this will cause an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> being thrown, and the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy> object state will not change.
trans-unit.target: Gjøre dette fører til at en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>som et, og <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>objekt tilstand, endres ikke.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy> </xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: If the user wants to cancel the operation from the event, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlRowsCopiedEventArgs.Abort%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlRowsCopiedEventArgs> can be used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis brukeren ønsker å avbryte operasjonen fra hendelsen, i <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlRowsCopiedEventArgs.Abort%2A>-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlRowsCopiedEventArgs>kan brukes.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlRowsCopiedEventArgs> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlRowsCopiedEventArgs.Abort%2A>

trans-unit.source: (See [Transaction and Bulk Copy Operations](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for examples that use the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlRowsCopiedEventArgs.Abort%2A> property.) No action, such as transaction activity, is supported in the connection during the execution of the bulk copy operation, and it is recommended that you not use the same connection used during the SqlRowsCopied event.
trans-unit.target: (Se [transaksjon og massekopieringsoperasjoner](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) eksempler som bruker den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlRowsCopiedEventArgs.Abort%2A>egenskap.)</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlRowsCopiedEventArgs.Abort%2A> Ingen handling, for eksempel transaksjonsaktivitet som støttes i tilkoblingen under kjøring av massekopieringsoperasjon, og det anbefales at du ikke bruker samme tilkobling brukes under SqlRowsCopied-hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: However, you can open a different connection.
trans-unit.target: Du kan imidlertid åpne en annen tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av den gjeldende forekomsten av den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>.
trans-unit.target: Kall `Dispose` når du er ferdig med <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Den `Dispose` metoden forlater den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>i en ubrukelig tilstand.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Etter kall `Dispose`, må du frigi alle referanser til den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>Slik saneringsoppsamlingen kan gjenvinne minnet som den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>ble bruker.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [implementere metoden fjerne](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid kall `Dispose` før du slipper siste referanse til <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Ellers ressurser den bruker vil ikke bli frigjort før saneringsoppsamling kall av <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>objektets `Finalize` metode.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy>

trans-unit.source: Copies all rows from the supplied <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref> array to a destination table specified by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.DestinationTableName*> property of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Overfører alle radene fra den angitte <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"> </xref> matrisen slik at en måltabell som er angitt av det <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.DestinationTableName*>-egenskapen til det <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"> </xref> objektet.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.DestinationTableName*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref> whose rows will be copied to the destination table.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"> </xref> rader som skal kopieres til måltabellen.

trans-unit.source: Copies all rows from the supplied <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> array to a destination table specified by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.DestinationTableName*> property of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Overfører alle radene fra den angitte <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> matrisen slik at en måltabell som er angitt av det <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.DestinationTableName*>-egenskapen til det <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"> </xref> objektet.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.DestinationTableName*>

trans-unit.source: While the bulk copy operation is in progress, the associated destination <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> is busy serving it, and no other operations can be performed on the connection.
trans-unit.target: Mens massekopieringsoperasjon pågår, tilknyttede målet <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>er opptatt for den, og ingen andre operasjoner kan ikke utføres for tilkoblingen.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappings%2A> collection maps from the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> columns to the destination database table.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappings%2A>samlingen tilordner fra den <xref:System.Data.DataRow>kolonner til måltabellen for databasen.</xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappings%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> objects that will be copied to the destination table.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> objektene som skal kopieres til måltabellen.

trans-unit.source: Copies all rows in the supplied <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> to a destination table specified by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.DestinationTableName*> property of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Kopierer alle rader i den angitte <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> til en måltabell som er angitt av den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.DestinationTableName*>for den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"> </xref> objektet.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.DestinationTableName*>

trans-unit.source: All rows in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> are copied to the destination table except those that have been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Alle rader i den <xref:System.Data.DataTable>kopieres til måltabellen unntatt de som er slettet.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: While the bulk copy operation is in progress, the associated destination <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> is busy serving it, and no other operations can be performed on the connection.
trans-unit.target: Mens massekopieringsoperasjon pågår, tilknyttede målet <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>er opptatt for den, og ingen andre operasjoner kan ikke utføres for tilkoblingen.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappings%2A> collection maps from the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> columns to the destination database table.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappings%2A>samlingen tilordner fra den <xref:System.Data.DataTable>kolonner til måltabellen for databasen.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappings%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> whose rows will be copied to the destination table.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> rader som skal kopieres til måltabellen.

trans-unit.source: Copies all rows in the supplied <xref href="System.Data.IDataReader"></xref> to a destination table specified by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.DestinationTableName*> property of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Kopierer alle rader i den angitte <xref href="System.Data.IDataReader"> </xref> til en måltabell som er angitt av den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.DestinationTableName*>for den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"> </xref> objektet.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.DestinationTableName*>

trans-unit.source: The copy operation starts at the next available row in the reader.
trans-unit.target: Kopieringen begynner den neste tilgjengelige raden i leseren.

trans-unit.source: Most of the time, the reader was just returned by <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.ExecuteReader%2A> or a similar call, so the next available row is the first row.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis, leseren bare ble returnert av <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>eller et lignende kall, slik at den neste tilgjengelige raden er den første raden.</xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>

trans-unit.source: To process multiple results, call <xref:System.Data.IDataReader.NextResult%2A> on the data reader and call WriteToServer again.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil behandle flere resultater, kan du kalle <xref:System.Data.IDataReader.NextResult%2A>på dataleseren og kall WriteToServer på nytt.</xref:System.Data.IDataReader.NextResult%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that using WriteToServer modifies the state of the reader.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at bruker WriteToServer endrer statusen til leseren.

trans-unit.source: The method will call <xref:System.Data.IDataReader.Read%2A> until it returns false, the operation is aborted, or an error occurs.
trans-unit.target: Kaller metoden <xref:System.Data.IDataReader.Read%2A>før den returnerer false, operasjonen er avbrutt eller det oppstår en feil.</xref:System.Data.IDataReader.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: This means that the data reader will be in a different state, probably at the end of the result set, when the WriteToServer operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: Dette betyr at dataleseren er i en annen tilstand, sannsynligvis på slutten av resultatsettet, når WriteToServer-operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: While the bulk copy operation is in progress, the associated destination <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> is busy serving it, and no other operations can be performed on the connection.
trans-unit.target: Mens massekopieringsoperasjon pågår, tilknyttede målet <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>er opptatt for den, og ingen andre operasjoner kan ikke utføres for tilkoblingen.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappings%2A> collection maps from the data reader columns to the destination database table.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappings%2A>samlingen tilordnes fra dataene leseren kolonner til måltabellen for databasen.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappings%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.IDataReader"></xref> whose rows will be copied to the destination table.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.IDataReader"> </xref> rader som skal kopieres til måltabellen.

trans-unit.source: Copies only rows that match the supplied row state in the supplied <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> to a destination table specified by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.DestinationTableName*> property of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Overfører bare rader som samsvarer med tilstanden angitte rad i den angitte <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> til en måltabell som er angitt av den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.DestinationTableName*>for den <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"> </xref> objektet.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.DestinationTableName*>

trans-unit.source: Only rows in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> that are in the states indicated in the `rowState` argument and have not been deleted are copied to the destination table.
trans-unit.target: Bare rader i den <xref:System.Data.DataTable>som er i tilstand som er angitt i den `rowState` argumentet og ikke er slettet kopieres til måltabellen.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If <xref:System.Data.DataRowState> is specified, any <xref:System.Data.DataRowState>, <xref:System.Data.DataRowState>, and <xref:System.Data.DataRowState> rows will also be copied to the server.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis <xref:System.Data.DataRowState>er angitt noen <xref:System.Data.DataRowState>, <xref:System.Data.DataRowState>, og <xref:System.Data.DataRowState>rader vil også bli kopiert til serveren.</xref:System.Data.DataRowState> </xref:System.Data.DataRowState> </xref:System.Data.DataRowState> </xref:System.Data.DataRowState>

trans-unit.source: No exception will be raised.
trans-unit.target: Ingen unntak vil starter.

trans-unit.source: While the bulk copy operation is in progress, the associated destination <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> is busy serving it, and no other operations can be performed on the connection.
trans-unit.target: Mens massekopieringsoperasjon pågår, tilknyttede målet <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>er opptatt for den, og ingen andre operasjoner kan ikke utføres for tilkoblingen.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappings%2A> collection maps from the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> columns to the destination database table.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappings%2A>samlingen tilordner fra den <xref:System.Data.DataTable>kolonner til måltabellen for databasen.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.ColumnMappings%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> whose rows will be copied to the destination table.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> rader som skal kopieres til måltabellen.

trans-unit.target: En verdi fra den <xref href="System.Data.DataRowState"> </xref> opplisting.

trans-unit.source: Only rows matching the row state are copied to the destination.
trans-unit.target: Bare rader som samsvarer med tilstanden rad er kopiert til målet.

trans-unit.target: Asynkron versjonen av <> </> *>, som kopierer alle radene fra den angitte <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"> </xref> matrisen slik at en måltabell som er angitt av det <> </> *> for i <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref> whose rows will be copied to the destination table.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"> </xref> rader som skal kopieres til måltabellen.

trans-unit.target: En oppgave som representerer den asynkrone operasjonen.

trans-unit.target: Asynkron versjonen av <> </> *>, som kopierer alle radene fra den angitte <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> matrisen slik at en måltabell som er angitt av det <> </> *> for i <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om asynkrone programming i den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] dataleverandøren for [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)], se [asynkront Programming](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Returned in the task object, there was a connection pool timeout.
trans-unit.target: Returnert i oppgaveobjektet oppstod det et tidsavbrudd for tilkoblingsutvalg.

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous version of <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.WriteToServer*>, which copies only rows that match the supplied row state in the supplied <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> to a destination table specified by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy.DestinationTableName*> property of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlBulkCopy"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: The cancellation token can be used to request that the operation be abandoned before the command timeout elapses.
trans-unit.target: Avbryte tokenet kan brukes til å be om at operasjonen forlates før tidsavbruddet for kommando utløper.

trans-unit.source: Exceptions will be reported via the returned Task object.
